===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|𡈼|耳|㥁|c1=p|c2=s|c3=s|t2=ear|ls=psc}} ([[𦗟]]).

===Etymology===
This is traditionally considered to have the same origin as {{och-l|聖|to hear; wise; sage}} and {{och-l|聲|sound}}. Additionally, it may be also related to {{och-l|聆|to hear; to listen}} ({{zh-ref|Wang, 1982}}).

Outside connections unclear, although note Proto-{{w|Hlai}} ''*hliːŋ'' (“to hear (it said)”) < Pre-Hlai ''*(h)leːŋ'' ({{zh-ref|Norquest, 2007}}).

Derivatives:
* {{och-l|廳|hall, i.e. where hearings take place}}
* {{och-l|廷|palace courtyard}}.
